snippet: The case of Alexander Aan, who was imprisoned after posting commentaries online, is part of a rise in persecution connected to freedom of religion in Indonesia in recent years.
abstract: Case of Alexander Aan, who was imprisoned in Indonesia for over 19 months after posting atheist commentaries online, is part of a rise in persecution connected to freedom of religion in the country in recent years.
lead_paragraph: The case of Alexander Aan, who was imprisoned after posting commentaries online, is part of a rise in persecution connected to freedom of religion in Indonesia in recent years.

headline.main: Embrace of Atheism Put an Indonesian in Prison
headline.print_headline: Embrace of Atheism Put an Indonesian in Prison
